metadata.synopsis: After the party, Astarion is standing in a corner, bottle of wine in hand, in a bad mood. Everything's too merry for him, not hedonistic enough. But there's the possibility of a little hedonism with the player, if you both agree to meet up for a little 'fun' later in the night. That's a tantilising thought - there might be something to look forward to after all.

2.speaker: Astarion
2.text: You know, I never pictured myself as a hero.
2.context: CinematicNodeContext: Holding a bottle of wineNodeContext: Looking around, holding a bottle of wine

25.speaker: Astarion
25.text: Never thought I'd be the one they toast for saving so many lives. And now that I'm here...
25.context: CinematicNodeContext: Holding a bottle of wineNodeContext: Reflecting. Holding a bottle of wine

130.speaker: Astarion
130.text: I hate it. This is awful.
130.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion drinks wine from the bottle, speaks his line, then sets the bottle down on a table.NodeContext: Swigs from the wine, but it tastes foul. He pulls a face in reaction to the wine, but 'I hate it. This is awful' is referring to the party generally. He sets the bottle down on a table beside him.

40.speaker: Player
40.context: NodeContext: Can't believe how nieve you are

75.speaker: Astarion
75.text: We killed some goblins to save some tieflings. The tally of lives didn't change much.
75.context: NodeContext: Can't believe how nieve you are

15.speaker: Astarion
15.text: But what do I get for all my hard work? A pat on the head and vinegar for wine.
15.context: NodeContext: Can't believe how nieve you are

105.speaker: Player
105.text: Whinge all you want - I'm having fun.
105.context: NodeContext: Can't believe how nieve you are

80.speaker: Astarion
80.text: By all means, go and enjoy yourself.

108.speaker: Astarion
108.text: I'll be here, waiting for the sunrise.

27.speaker: Player
27.text: True, the goblins would have thrown a wilder party.
27.context: NodeContext: Can't believe how nieve you are

68.speaker: Astarion
68.text: I'm just looking for a little more excitement. A little more fun.
68.context: NodeContext: Can't believe how nieve you are

16.speaker: Player
16.text: And what's your idea of 'a little fun'?
16.context: NodeContext: Can't believe how nieve you are

57.speaker: Astarion
57.text: By the hells. Sex. Passion. Fun.
57.context: NodeContext: Can't believe how nieve you are

20.speaker: Astarion
20.text: It's easy for some. I see Lae'zel's marked you as her territory.

12.speaker: Astarion
12.text: I just hope she leaves you in one piece. We can't take a tenday for you to recover from whatever her idea of 'fun' is.
12.context: NodeContext: a hint of bitterness, but only a hint

0.speaker: Player
0.text: I'm looking forward to it. It'll be fun.
0.context: NodeContext: a hint of bitterness, but only a hint

24.speaker: Player
24.context: NodeContext: a hint of bitterness, but only a hint

103.speaker: Player
103.context: NodeContext: a hint of bitterness, but only a hint

118.speaker: Astarion
118.text: Ha! No, my love, I'm not jealous of the beating our gith friend will give you.
118.context: NodeContext: a hint of bitterness, but only a hint

81.speaker: Astarion
81.text: Ha! No, my love, you and Shadowheart can get up to whatever you want. It means nothing to me.
81.context: NodeContext: a hint of bitterness, but only a hint

76.speaker: Astarion
76.text: Ha! No, my love, I'm not jealous of the walking encyclopaedia.
76.context: NodeContext: a hint of bitterness, but only a hint

4.speaker: Astarion
4.text: Ha! No, my love, I'm not jealous of the tiefling.
4.context: NodeContext: a hint of bitterness, but only a hint

112.speaker: Astarion
112.text: But you go ahead. Have fun.
112.context: NodeContext: a hint of bitterness, but only a hint

115.speaker: Astarion
115.text: Ha! No. If he had an incubus instead of that cambion? That might be a different story.
115.context: NodeContext: incubus = sexy male devil. Cambion = trickster devil (in this case female)

102.speaker: Astarion
102.text: Ha! No, I've seen enough blades in my time.

142.speaker: Player
142.text: Are you offering something better? Because I could be persuaded...

37.speaker: Astarion
37.text: It's easy for some. You and Shadowheart seem to have a connection. It looks very sweet.

111.speaker: Astarion
111.text: Not what I'd call 'passionate', or 'interesting', but sweet.

122.speaker: Astarion
122.text: It's easy for some, of course. You and Gale seem to be getting on very well.

141.speaker: Astarion
141.text: I wonder if he uses magic in the bedroom? That could go very well or very badly.

78.speaker: Astarion
78.text: It's easy for some, of course. You and Wyll seem to be getting on very well.

104.speaker: Astarion
104.text: Are you looking forward to seeing his 'Blade of Frontiers'? I hope it's more greatsword than dagger.

18.speaker: Astarion
18.text: It's easy for some, of course. You and Karlach seem to be getting on very well.

51.speaker: Astarion
51.text: It's none of my business, of course. I wouldn't want to intrude.

126.speaker: Astarion
126.text: By the hells. Sex, my dear. A night of passion.
126.context: NodeContext: Can't believe how nieve you are

8.speaker: Player
8.text: That had better not mean 'I want to kill something'.
8.context: NodeContext: Worried the player will think Astarion wants to have sex with them. They're not up to his standards, though.

107.speaker: Astarion
107.text: Not with you, just to be clear.
107.context: NodeContext: Worried the player will think Astarion wants to have sex with them. They're not up to his standards, though.

14.speaker: Astarion
14.text: I mean, can you imagine? Urgh. No.
14.context: NodeContext: Worried the player will think Astarion wants to have sex with them. They're not up to his standards, though.

54.speaker: Astarion
54.text: Anyway, don't let me keep you. I'm sure you have someone else to sniff around.

138.speaker: Astarion
138.text: Nothing so dramatic. Just you and me and - well, maybe a little death? Figuratively speaking.
138.context: NodeContext: 'little death' in the sense of 'orgasm'

74.speaker: Astarion
74.text: Not at all! I was hoping for companionship and - well, maybe a little death. Figuratively speaking.
74.context: NodeContext: 'little death' in the sense of 'orgasm'

48.speaker: Player
48.text: We could have fun? We could spend some 'quality time' together.
48.context: NodeContext: teasing the player for their interest in another character

88.speaker: Astarion
88.text: Do you think Lae'zel would approve? I saw how she looked at you earlier.
88.context: NodeContext: teasing the player for their interest in another character

119.speaker: Astarion
119.text: I'd hate to get between the gith and her trophy. No, I think we'll end this evening as friends.

93.speaker: Astarion
93.text: Do you think Shadowheart would approve? I saw how she looked at you earlier.
93.context: NodeContext: teasing the player for their interest in another character

23.speaker: Astarion
23.text: I don't know what her idea of a good time is, but it seems to involve you. I'd hate to intrude.

5.speaker: Player
5.text: True, I'd rather lie with them.

120.speaker: Astarion
120.text: Do you think Gale would approve? I saw how he looked at you earlier.
120.context: NodeContext: teasing the player for their interest in another character

114.speaker: Astarion
114.text: Do you think Karlach would approve? I saw how she looked at you earlier.
114.context: NodeContext: teasing the player for their interest in another character

7.speaker: Astarion
7.text: Do you think Wyll would approve? I saw how he looked at you earlier.
7.context: NodeContext: teasing the player for their interest in another character

101.speaker: Astarion
101.text: No, I wouldn't want to get in the middle of whatever that is. We'll end tonight as friends.

22.speaker: Astarion
22.text: Well, that'd certainly spice up this evening.
22.context: NodeContext: Response to 'I'll see you later tonight.' - player just agreed to hook up with you

44.speaker: Astarion
44.text: Let's wait until things quieten down. Once the others are asleep, we'll find each other.
44.context: NodeContext: Response to 'I'll see you later tonight.' - player just agreed to hook up with you

83.speaker: Player
83.text: All right, let's do it. I'll see you later.
83.context: NodeContext: Response to 'I'll see you later tonight.' - player just agreed to hook up with you

55.speaker: Astarion
55.text: Indeed you will, my love. Indeed you will.
55.context: NodeContext: Response to 'I'll see you later tonight.' - player just agreed to hook up with you

56.speaker: Player
56.text: I'm not sure. Let me get back to you.

64.speaker: Astarion
64.text: All right, but don't take too long. You're not the only tasty morsel around here.

72.speaker: Astarion
72.text: Never listen to your second thoughts. They always spoil the fun.

95.speaker: Astarion
95.text: But fine. If you're determined to ruin your evening, I won't stop you.

77.speaker: Astarion
77.text: I'm flattered, but I think not. It's not you, you understand, it's me.
77.context: NodeContext: pretending he's trying to reassure you

132.speaker: Astarion
132.context: NodeContext: previous line: 'it's not you. It's me.'

131.speaker: Player
131.text: We could have fun? We could spend some 'quality time' together.
131.context: NodeContext: your advances have just been rejected

6.speaker: Player
6.text: Living in constant peril isn't exciting enough for you?
6.context: NodeContext: your advances have just been rejected

33.speaker: Astarion
33.text: Don't be so sour. I like a good time as much as anyone.
33.context: NodeContext: your advances have just been rejected

86.speaker: Astarion
86.text: You know, we could always make our own entertainment, darling. Get a little closer, so to speak.
86.context: NodeContext: your advances have just been rejected

110.speaker: Player
110.text: I'd rather bed a goblin, darling.
110.context: NodeContext: your advances have just been rejected

9.speaker: Player
9.context: NodeContext: your advances have just been rejected

135.speaker: Astarion
135.text: And here I mistook you for someone with taste. A pity.
135.context: NodeContext: your advances have just been rejected

58.speaker: Player
58.context: NodeContext: Player said they might sleep with you if you say 'please'. You're thrown - you've never been in this position before

35.speaker: Astarion
35.context: NodeContext: Player said they might sleep with you if you say 'please'. You're thrown - you've never been in this position before

45.speaker: Player
45.context: NodeContext: They just told you they'd rather fuck a goblin. You're kind of amused, kind of angry,

97.speaker: Astarion
97.text: You are an insolent little pup, aren't you?
97.context: NodeContext: They just told you they'd rather fuck a goblin. You're kind of amused, kind of angry,

67.speaker: Astarion
67.text: You are an insolent little pup, aren't you?
67.context: NodeContext: They just told you they'd rather fuck a goblin. You're kind of amused, kind of angry,

117.speaker: Astarion
117.text: But have it your way. I'm happy to entertain myself.

140.speaker: Player
140.context: NodeContext: Annoyed, you've just been humiliated. 'You insolent little brat' is the full line.

129.speaker: Astarion
129.context: NodeContext: Annoyed, you've just been humiliated. 'You insolent little brat' is the full line.

133.speaker: Astarion
133.text: Fine. Enjoy your night with whatever beast will have you.

84.speaker: Player
84.text: Good boy! Let's get together tonight.

43.speaker: Astarion
43.text: Cheeky little pup. I'll see you later.

50.speaker: Astarion
50.text: Will you now? Don't take too long. You're not the only tasty morsel here.

70.speaker: Player
70.text: I'm kidding. Once everyone's asleep, I'll find you and we can have some fun.

26.speaker: Player
26.text: Living in constant peril isn't exciting enough for you?
26.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player turns and walks away.NodeContext: Said to player as they walk away.

94.speaker: Player
94.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player turns and walks away.NodeContext: Said to player as they walk away.

47.speaker: Astarion
47.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player turns and walks away.NodeContext: Said to player as they walk away.

49.speaker: Player
49.text: Take his bottle and try the wine.
49.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player picks up the bottle and takes a swig.

13.speaker: Narrator
13.text: *It's a heavy, rich red - dry and sharp.*
13.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player picks up the bottle and takes a swig.

1.speaker: Astarion
1.context: NodeContext: referring to the wine. The player's just been told that the wine tastes delicious, but to a vampire it still tastes like muck.

82.speaker: Astarion
82.text: All I want is a little fun. Is that so much to ask?

21.speaker: Player
21.text: You did a good thing. Suck it up and enjoy yourself.
21.context: NodeContext: Wistful, maybe with a giggle

123.speaker: Astarion
123.text: Enjoy myself? There's a worm in my brain, hunters on my trail, and all I've got to drink is wine that tastes like vinegar.

30.speaker: Player
30.text: Relax, all your problems will still be there in the morning.

134.speaker: Astarion
134.text: That means I have to survive tonight. And this party.

127.speaker: Astarion
127.text: Enjoy myself? There's a worm in my brain, I'm surrounded by idiots, and all I've got to drink is wine that tastes like vinegar.

52.speaker: Player
52.text: It's not that bad. Think of all the goblins you killed.
52.context: NodeContext: Wistful, maybe with a giggle

29.speaker: Astarion
29.context: NodeContext: Wistful, maybe with a giggle

46.speaker: Astarion
46.text: Still, I would've liked more for my trouble than a pat on the head and vinegar for wine.

10.speaker: Astarion
10.text: I hope you're not here to beg. It's so unbecoming.

60.speaker: Astarion
60.text: You're eager, aren't you? But we need to wait a little longer.

139.speaker: Astarion
139.text: Once everyone's in their bedrolls, we'll slip out of ours and find each other.

73.speaker: Astarion
73.text: Do you mind? I'm very busy.

121.speaker: Player
121.text: Just so you know, I'm spending tonight with Lae'zel.

99.speaker: Player
99.text: Just so you know, I'm spending tonight with Shadowheart.

136.speaker: Player
136.text: Just so you know, I'm spending tonight with Gale.

96.speaker: Player
96.text: Just so you know, I'm spending tonight with Karlach.

128.speaker: Astarion
128.text: Are you now? Well, lucky her.

42.speaker: Player
42.text: Just so you know, I'm spending tonight with Wyll.

109.speaker: Astarion
109.text: Are you now? Well, lucky him.

85.speaker: Astarion
85.text: Thank you so much for telling me. Now please do piss off.

41.speaker: Player
41.text: Interested in sharing a bed tonight?

63.speaker: Astarion
63.text: A bed and so much more.

144.speaker: Player
144.text: Interested in sharing a bed tonight?

143.speaker: Astarion
143.text: If you're looking for another shot, I'm afraid you've missed it.
